course_title: Adult Gerontology Acute Care NP Practicum II
course_description: This course focuses on serious acute illness and exacerbation of chronic illness in adults/older adults from a systems perspective. The role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant, and interdisciplinary team member in an acute care settings is highlighted.
prerequisites: NRSG 767D and NRSG 768D as prerequisite, NRSG 769D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 5311, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: J. Adamski, Status: Open
